Recruit Brooks signs with mens basketball

The Penn State mens basketball team received a National Letter of Intent from 6foot8 190pound forward Jeff Brooks yesterday the final day of the early singing period PERIOD

Brooks a senior at Doss High School in Louisville Ky. chose Penn State over Arkansas PERIOD He averaged just  points and  rebounds his junior season but gained national attention during the summer when he was named MVP of the BlueChip Camp in Georgetown Ky. and the FiveStar Camp in Pittsburgh PERIOD Hes regarded as a contender for Kentuckys Mr PERIOD Basketball award this year PERIOD

Penn State assistant coach Kurt Kanaskie said that Penn State made home visits on the first day they were permitted as well as the last PERIOD Kanaskie also watched practice at Brooks high school Tuesday PERIOD

Penn State now has no scholarship offers remaining PERIOD Talor Battle a 5foot11 160pound point guard from Albany N.Y PERIOD signed last Wednesday PERIOD

 Penn State head coach Ed DeChellis said PERIOD

Corey McLaughlin

Anticipated showers might affect parking

Penn State is alerting fans that there will likely be parking availability changes for the Penn StateMichigan State football game on Saturday as a result of the rain expected in the Centre Region during the next two days PERIOD

More than two inches of rain is expected and will not have any effect on the game itself which will kickoff at  p.m PERIOD in Beaver Stadium PERIOD Parking lots will open at  a.m PERIOD and stadium public gates will open at  a.m PERIOD

Grass fields used for parking near the stadium may be saturated from the rainfall resulting in some reduction in parking in those lots PERIOD Fans driving to the game should allow extra time for arrival and be advised that they may be redirected away from their usual parking area PERIOD

Recreational vehicles that normally park in the Brown lot off Park Avenue and other lots may be directed to alternate parking on Saturday according to Herb Schmidt Penn State Associate Athletic Director PERIOD
